title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript SDK for Ollama; chat, generate, embed, pull, and manage models from Node or browsers.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client; chat, generate, embed, pull, list, delete models with a simple synchronous/async API.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration package to use Ollama models as LLMs, chat, or embeddings inside LangChain pipelines.

title: ollama-webui (ollama-webui/ollama-webui)
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat UI, model management, multi-user, RAG, plugins).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama; generate, chat, pull, list models with fluent builder API.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Official Ruby gem for Ollama; simple interface to chat and generate completions.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI for chatting with Ollama models, history, syntax highlighting.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models as GitHub Copilot replacement.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and PVC model cache.

title: ollama-chat
summary: Minimal React chat app that connects to local Ollama via ollama-js, no backend needed.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Python notebook showing RAG pipeline using Ollama embeddings + Chroma + LangChain.

title: ollama-n8n-node
summary: n8n community node to call Ollama models inside automation workflows.

title: ollama-dagger-module
summary: Dagger module to spin up Ollama service in CI pipelines for testing LLM features.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Community Rust crate providing typed async client for Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community C# / .NET client for Ollama with async streaming and dependency-injection helpers.

title: ollama-zig
summary: Zig client library for Ollama REST API, still experimental but usable for chatting.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in Haystack pipelines.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-host Discord bot that answers users via local Ollama models with slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that brings local Ollama completions into Slack channels/threads.
